attributes.action: Terminate our relationship with the World Health Organisation.
attributes.background: President Trump has terminated the US relationship with the World Health Organisation for failing to act appropriately over Covid-19.  See Trump: 'We are terminating relationship with WHO' - BBC News. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lGgMBHJq8VM. We should too.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314810.
